translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ということがあってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what happened."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気づいたらテーブルの上にあったものだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I noticed it was on the table, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にはいらないものだし、ランス君にあげるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's something we don't need, so I'll give it to you, Rance-kun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベゼルアイが青い円柱を差しだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye held out a blue cylinder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なにこれ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What is this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖女モンスターが揃った時にだけ現れる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a miraculous item that appears only when all the saint monsters are gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡の品よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a miracle item."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういうアイテムなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of item is it?"
"...Who knows?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わけの分からんものを寄越そうとすんな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't try to give me something I don't understand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、物を恵んでもらえるだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you should be grateful just to receive something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがたいと思いなさいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if you don't know what it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がー！　つつつ、ツインテール引っ張るんじゃ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah! St-stop pulling my twin tails--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、いたた！　いたたたた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ouch, ouch! Ouch ouch ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、喧嘩しないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, don't fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖女モンスターが揃ったときにだけ現れる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Only when all the saint monsters are gathered, a miraculous item appears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡の品ねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a miracle item, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、何かの役には立つ……かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I wonder if it might be useful for something...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭で、エターナルヒーローの面々が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the courtyard, the members of the Eternal Hero

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お茶を飲んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were drinking tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……美味しいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... it's delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、儂はお茶飲めないんだけどね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I can't drink tea though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、拗ねないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, okay, don't sulk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、兵達がバタバタと移動していくの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, soldiers were hastily moving about,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横目に見ながらカフェが溜め息をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Cafe sighed as she glanced sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だけど、みんな大変そうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, but everyone looks like they're having a hard time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「物資が少なくなっていったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If supplies start running low,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうやってお茶が楽しめるのも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then enjoying tea like this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おしまいになるかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might come to an end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「物資の心配はあまりしなくても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't need to worry too much about supplies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前に決着をつけなければいけない戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is a battle that must be settled first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そっか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんにしても大変ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whatever it is, it's tough..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーに、これくらいぬるいぬるい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, this kind of thing is nothing serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らのときとはノリが違うよな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The vibe is different from our time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悲壮感の差ってーの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it the difference in the sense of despair?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ時代が違うもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the times are different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に刃向かうってこと自体が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To even defy the Demon King himself

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えられなかった頃とは何もかも違うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is completely different from the days when it was unthinkable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのとき、私達にこれだけの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If back then we had this many

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間と力があれば何かが違いましたかね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: companions and this much power, would anything have been different?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんま変わらなかったのと違うか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think it would have changed much, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうすればいいか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not knowing what to do

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分からないことだらけなのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and being full of uncertainties

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も昔も大差ないからなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is pretty much the same now as it was back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうときは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At times like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつの出番だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's that guy's turn to step in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変態野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The perverted guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、ホ・ラガのこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you mean Ho-Raga..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、彼は私達パーティーの知恵袋。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, he's the brains of our party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうときには気の利いた作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In times like this, he quickly comes up with clever strategies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つ二つとすぐさま立ててくれましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or two right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼がいたらどれだけ心強いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How reassuring it would be if he were here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういや、あいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, that guy..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気づいたらテーブルの上にあったものだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I noticed it was on the table, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にはいらないものだし、ランス君にあげるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's something we don't need, so I'll give it to you, Rance-kun."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bezel Eye held out a blue cylinder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なにこれ？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖女モンスターが揃った時にだけ現れる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a miraculous item that appears only when all the saint monsters are gathered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡の品よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a miracle item."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういうアイテムなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of item is it?"
"...Who knows?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't try to give me something I don't understand!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、物を恵んでもらえるだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, you should be grateful just to receive something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがたいと思いなさいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if you don't know what it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がー！　つつつ、ツインテール引っ張るんじゃ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah! St-stop pulling my twin tails--

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、いたた！　いたたたた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ouch, ouch! Ouch ouch ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、喧嘩しないで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, don't fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖女モンスターが揃ったときにだけ現れる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Only when all the saint monsters are gathered, a miraculous item appears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡の品ねえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a miracle item, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、何かの役には立つ……かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I wonder if it might be useful for something...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭で、エターナルヒーローの面々が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the courtyard, the members of the Eternal Hero

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お茶を飲んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were drinking tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……美味しいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... it's delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、儂はお茶飲めないんだけどね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I can't drink tea though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい、拗ねないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, okay, don't sulk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、兵達がバタバタと移動していくの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, soldiers were hastily moving about,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横目に見ながらカフェが溜め息をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Cafe sighed as she glanced sideways.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だけど、みんな大変そうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, but everyone looks like they're having a hard time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「物資が少なくなっていったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If supplies start running low,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうやってお茶が楽しめるのも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then enjoying tea like this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おしまいになるかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might come to an end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「物資の心配はあまりしなくても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don't need to worry too much about supplies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前に決着をつけなければいけない戦いです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is a battle that must be settled first."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、そっか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんにしても大変ね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whatever it is, it's tough..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーに、これくらいぬるいぬるい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, this kind of thing is nothing serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らのときとはノリが違うよな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The vibe is different from our time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悲壮感の差ってーの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it the difference in the sense of despair?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ時代が違うもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the times are different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に刃向かうってこと自体が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To even defy the Demon King himself

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 考えられなかった頃とは何もかも違うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is completely different from the days when it was unthinkable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのとき、私達にこれだけの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If back then we had this many

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間と力があれば何かが違いましたかね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: companions and this much power, would anything have been different?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんま変わらなかったのと違うか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think it would have changed much, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうすればいいか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not knowing what to do

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分からないことだらけなのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and being full of uncertainties

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も昔も大差ないからなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is pretty much the same now as it was back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうときは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At times like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつの出番だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's that guy's turn to step in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変態野郎」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The perverted guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、ホ・ラガのこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you mean Ho-Raga..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、彼は私達パーティーの知恵袋。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, he's the brains of our party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうときには気の利いた作戦を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In times like this, he quickly comes up with clever strategies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つ二つとすぐさま立ててくれましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or two right away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼がいたらどれだけ心強いか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How reassuring it would be if he were here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういや、あいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, that guy..."
